author: Kuren Charles
comment: Best watch face ever.  Won't know until Saturday, but the Lite version has poor Herr Schmidt going to the office on both Saturday and Sunday.   Would be awesome to see some weekend activities, maybe even Friday night pub, or Wednesday date-night with the wife, maybe a game of bridge or canasta?

author: Stephan Tindle
comment: It would be good to be able to change the date format ie. to dd/mm/yy as most  people are not North American and weekend activities would be great also. Otherwise good job!
title: I like it but...

author: Andrea Cudin
comment: I love it, beautiful drawings. Great and simple idea, gentle on 🔋 life. But: I have never seen mr Schmidt waking up nor brushing his teeth - I guess it happens quite early in the morning. Furthermore I do not like the fact that during weekends it still shows Mr Smith working at his desk. Can you add an image of Mr Schmidt mowing the lawn or reading the newspaper? Or even going for a walk with his wife?
title: Great with two caveats

author: sean edelson
comment: However having paid for the app I would expect just a bit more CUSTOMIZATION. I mean there is not even an option for am/pm. Not weather display. No watch or phone percentages. The only reason I'm not requesting a refund is in hopes you will implement at least some of these features and the fact the concept is great. I will update my review accordingly...

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: Did you know about the companion app configuration screen? I am not sure if we will meet your exoectations, but currently we are working on a set of New features; partially available in the Lite version.

title: Love the concept

author: Joe D'Marco
comment: Thk u for the 12 hr time! Maybe the phone and battery levels can also be a click on the time deal.. Love the art work! 2 requests, put 12 hr time and also an icon 4 watch and phone battery charges. My last watch face had them. My cell died during the night and I didn't no bcse nothing on watch face, on my wrist as I slept.

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: Our very first beta had a battery feature, that we abandoned for design reasons. Maybe we should think about this again. 12 hour time is already there.

title: Very nice!

author: Angela Wong
comment: I find this creation very fun, love the graphics and love the different picture scenarios that change throughout the course of the day.  I agree with the masses, please create weekend/recreational scenes.  :)

author: Gladys Dixon
comment: Mr. Schmidt needs better weekends! Great concept!  Great job you guys!
title: Great but....

author: Roger Gimbrere
comment: Charming and gorgeous. Just wish it also displayed date.

author: Trent Fordham
comment: ....loved it so much I bought the paid.   This is what Android Wear is all about.   Not only the ability to change your watch face,  but to find gems like this one.   It is a work of art and a brilliant idea.
title: Downloaded the lite version....

author: Mark Houghton
comment: Surely Mister Schmidt needs the weekends off?
title: Workaholic

author: Robin Tapley
comment: Just wish I could have it in 12 and not 24 h time!

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: Here you are. Please check-out release 1.3 and find the new feature at the configuration screen.

title: Excellent!

author: Sherrilee Pierce
comment: I love this app. The animations are fun and cool and I love seeing what Mister Schmidt is doing throughout the day. Great clock widget to download.
title: Great clock widget!

author: Indira sing
comment: Woow amazing! I really like this all features.Brilliant app, It works great.

author: Jane Daw
comment: Can he have a coffee break.and when he home read the newspaper thank you.
title: Great

author: Beau Lawson
comment: This is a really creative face for your smart watch. Great animations!
title: Fantastic!

author: Jan Pedersen
comment: I have the other app and also love this one. Great job.

author: AALIYAH ANGEL
comment: Nice awesome interface for my smart watch. keep it up

author: sophia wright
comment: Addictive... This game is very simple to handle.Had a great fun.

author: White Jonson
comment: Excellent! A really creative and awesome app.I really like it.

author: Racheal Marsh
comment: Fun & Great game.... Its easy use and addictive app.

author: Tony Marshal
comment: Great. The best Creative app in google play.

author: Marcus Dean
comment: Nice and funny design. Suits well on my wear.

author: Peter Montero
comment: Really like this one. Funny animation. One of a kind.

author: Alexander Welroof
comment: I love this app.great app for great price

author: Prasma Anindita
comment: Nice looking widget, loved it.

author: andy mitchel
comment: wow. awesome app for smart watch.

author: April Haiden
comment: Good concept.100% functioning.

author: Cazalet Millicent
comment: I just can't change the image and I can't find any options other than the time settings. Hopefully it'll cycle on its own because I'm stuck with a glaringly bright white face. Moto X 2014 with first gen lg g watch.

reply.author: Andreas Schosser
reply.content: The timeface will change repeatedly, depending on what Mister Schmidt is currently doing. You can change the time Mister Schmidt gets up if you like to. Please see the app description for more details. Thank you.

title: Overall it's nice

author: Coman Winifred
comment: just reinstalled it for the third time,  and it finally shows up on my Android wear options. Beautiful :)

author: Lorimer Martica
comment: Needless to say, don't expect your battery to last long :)
title: A ridiculous (in a good way) demo of what's possible on Wear.

author: Smale Trula
comment: This would be impeccably perfect is it were not for the fact that I can only have a dial for my watch. Please, developer, add phone battery dial!
title: Very good, needs phone battery indicator.

author: Farrish Elinore
comment: Brilliant game, works great. I don't even have to pull my phone out of my pocket to waste time anymore!
title: Waiting around just got amazing!

author: Parnton Rennie
comment: Perfect, it is a good face for my watch, even I think it could be better, maybe if you provide 2 or 3 more options if face, but I really think this is a great face for my watch.
title: Moto 360

author: Esther Naumann
comment: This one lets me wake up with a big smile on my face.

author: Nevils Leeuwen
comment: This game is simplistic in nature, but it is still very fun and addicting. Runs very well on my LG G Watch R.
title: Passes the time.

author: Mais Kala
comment: I love this watch face and all the different options.  My only wish would be that you could add the date.
title: Beautiful!

author: Bloomfield Gina
comment: Moto360. Crisp clean look, animation is smooth. Can't wait for the update that allows us to customize!
title: Looks great

author: Statham Chi-Yin
comment: A really creative and beautiful watch face. Clean, simple and straight forward. Nothing overly complicated.
title: Beautiful!

author: Aurie Reviere
comment: I play it all the time specially in detentions no bugs so far
title: AWSOME

author: Hudson Richie
comment: I play it all the time specially in detentions no bugs so far
title: AWSOME
